612020.name: Path Resonance: Preservation
612020.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Preservation, dealing Physical DMG to all enemies based on the total Shield between all allies.
612020.simple_desc: After using the Path Resonance, deals Physical DMG to all enemies based on the max DMG that can be absorbed by Shields on all allies.
612020.desc_battle: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Preservation, dealing Physical DMG to all enemies based on the total Shield between all allies.

612021.name: Resonance Formation: Zero-Dimensional Reinforcement
612021.desc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Preservation become CRIT Hits. For every Shielded character on the team, the CRIT DMG increases by 15%.
612021.simple_desc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Preservation are guaranteed to CRIT. The more characters there are with Shields, the higher the CRIT DMG.
612021.desc_battle: The attacks of Path Resonance: Preservation become CRIT Hits. For every Shielded character on the team, the CRIT DMG increases by 15%.

612022.name: Resonance Formation: Eutectic Reaction
612022.desc: When Path Resonance is used, all allies gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 1% of their respective Max HP, for 2 turns, and <u>Amber</u> is applied to all allies at the same time.
612022.simple_desc: Applies a Shield and <u>Amber</u> to all characters after using a Path Resonance.
612022.desc_battle: When Path Resonance is used, all allies gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 1% of their respective Max HP, for 2 turns, and <u>Amber</u> is applied to all allies at the same time.

612023.name: Resonance Formation: Isomorphous Reaction
612023.desc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates 40% Energy. When an ally gains a Shield, Path Resonance additionally regenerates 3% Energy.
612023.simple_desc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates Energy. When a character gains Shield, Path Resonance regenerates Energy.
612023.desc_battle: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates 40% Energy. When an ally gains a Shield, Path Resonance additionally regenerates 3% Energy.

612024.name: Resonance Interplay: Spiked Armor
612024.desc: There is a 150% base chance for Path Resonance: Preservation to inflict Bleed on the attacked target for 2 turn(s). Bleeding enemies will take Physical DoT equal to 12% of their Max HP at the start of each turn. This DMG cannot exceed 250% of the total amount of Shield effect currently active on all allies.
612024.simple_desc: After using a Path Resonance, there is a high chance of applying Bleed to the enemy. DMG dealt is based on the total Shield on all allies.

612025.name: Resonance Interplay: Cold Snap
612025.desc: When attacking Frozen enemy targets with Path Resonance: Preservation, the DMG dealt increases by 80% and the Freeze status on the enemy targets is removed. <u>Dissociation</u> will not be removed by this effect.
612025.simple_desc: Increases DMG dealt by Path Resonance: Preservation to Frozen enemies and dispels their Freeze status.

612026.name: Resonance Interplay: Reverse Quenching
612026.desc: When using Path Resonance, extends Shield duration by 2 turn(s) on characters whose HP is below 50% of their Max HP. For every character on which this takes effect, this current Path Resonance deals 20% more DMG.
612026.simple_desc: Casting the Path Resonance extends Shield duration for allies whose HP is below 50% and enables the next Path Resonance to deal more DMG.

612027.name: Resonance Interplay: Displaced Ascent
612027.desc: Using the Ultimate increases the next Path Resonance's Physical RES PEN by 8%, stacking up to 8 time(s).
612027.simple_desc: Using an Ultimate increases the next Path Resonance's Physical PEN.

612120.name: Path Resonance: Remembrance
612120.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Remembrance, dealing Ice DMG to all enemies with a 120% base chance to Freeze all enemies for 1 turn(s).
612120.simple_desc: After using Path Resonance, deals Ice DMG to all enemies with a high chance of Freezing them.
612120.desc_battle: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Remembrance, dealing Ice DMG to all enemies with a 120% base chance to Freeze all enemies for 1 turn(s).

612121.name: Resonance Formation: Total Recall
612121.desc: When Path Resonance is used, there is a 150% base chance to decrease enemies' chance to resist Frozen by 100% for 1 turn(s).
612121.simple_desc: When using Path Resonance, there is a high chance of reducing all enemies' Freeze RES.
612121.desc_battle: When Path Resonance is used, there is a 150% base chance to decrease enemies' chance to resist Frozen by 100% for 1 turn(s).

612122.name: Resonance Formation: Rich Experience
612122.desc: When using Path Resonance, there is a 150% base chance to apply <u>Eonian River</u> to all enemies for 1 turn.
612122.simple_desc: After using Path Resonance, there is a high chance to apply <u>Eonian River</u> to all enemies.
612122.desc_battle: When using Path Resonance, there is a 150% base chance to apply <u>Eonian River</u> to all enemies for 1 turn.

612123.name: Resonance Formation: First Love Once More
612123.desc: Upon battle entrance, Path Resonance regenerates 40% Energy. When an enemy becomes Frozen, Path Resonance additionally regenerates 5% Energy.
612123.simple_desc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates Energy. When an enemy becomes Frozen, Path Resonance regenerates Energy.
612123.desc_battle: Upon battle entrance, Path Resonance regenerates 40% Energy. When an enemy becomes Frozen, Path Resonance additionally regenerates 5% Energy.

612124.name: Resonance Interplay: Faces Places
612124.desc: When the Freeze effect caused by Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted by enemy targets, there is a 150% base chance of lowering the target's All-Type RES by 15% for 2 turn(s). For every 1% HP that each ally has lost, the target's All-Type RES is additionally lowered by 0.06%.
612124.simple_desc: When the Freeze effect of a Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted, reduces the enemy target(s)' All-Type RES based on the total lost HP of all team members.

612125.name: Resonance Interplay: Landscape in the Mist
612125.desc: When the Freeze effect caused by Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted by enemy targets, there is a 150% base chance of decreasing the target's SPD by 15% for 2 turn(s).
612125.simple_desc: When the Freeze effect of a Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted, there is a high chance of reducing the enemy's SPD.

612126.name: Resonance Interplay: Roar and Rustle
612126.desc: When the Freeze effect from the Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted, characters gain a Shield equal in strength to 40% of their Max HP for 2 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered once by each use of the Path Resonance.
612126.simple_desc: Gains a Shield when the Freeze effect from the Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted.

612127.name: Resonance Interplay: Seemingly Mirrored
612127.desc: Basic ATKs against enemies Frozen by the Path Resonance have a 100% base chance to inflict <u>Dissociation</u> on them for 1 turn(s).
612127.simple_desc: Basic ATKs against enemies Frozen by the Path Resonance have a high chance to inflict <u>Dissociation</u> on them.

612220.name: Path Resonance: Nihility
612220.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Nihility, with a 80% base chance to apply Burn, Shock, Bleed, and 2 stacks of Wind Shear on all enemies for 2 turn(s).
612220.simple_desc: After using a Path Resonance, there is a high chance of applying Burn, Shock, Bleed, and Wind Shear on all enemies.
612220.desc_battle: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Nihility, with a 80% base chance to apply Burn, Shock, Bleed, and 2 stacks of Wind Shear on all enemies for 2 turn(s).

612221.name: Resonance Formation: The Doubtful Fourfold Root
612221.desc: When using Path Resonance, increases the base chance of applying statuses by 100% and the duration of statuses by 1 turn, and adds 1 stack to all stackable statuses.
612221.simple_desc: When using the Path Resonance, increases the base chance of inflicting status effects, extends the duration of these status effects, and adds to their stacks.
612221.desc_battle: When using Path Resonance, increases the base chance of applying statuses by 100% and the duration of statuses by 1 turn, and adds 1 stack to all stackable statuses.

612222.name: Resonance Formation: Suffering and Sunshine
612222.desc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Nihility have a 100% base chance to inflict 2 stacks of <u>Confusion</u> and 2 stacks of <u>Devoid</u> on all enemies for 2 turn(s).
612222.simple_desc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Nihility have a high chance to apply <u>Confusion</u> and <u>Devoid</u>.
612222.desc_battle: The attacks of Path Resonance: Nihility have a 100% base chance to inflict 2 stacks of <u>Confusion</u> and 2 stacks of <u>Devoid</u> on all enemies for 2 turn(s).

612223.name: Resonance Formation: Outsider
612223.desc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates 40% Energy. When an enemy receives DoT, Path Resonance additionally regenerates 2% Energy.
612223.simple_desc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates Energy. When an enemy receives DoT, Path Resonance regenerates Energy.
612223.desc_battle: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates 40% Energy. When an enemy receives DoT, Path Resonance additionally regenerates 2% Energy.

612224.name: Resonance Interplay: Off the Beaten Track
612224.desc: After using a Path Resonance, for every type of debuff (out of Burn, Shock, Bleed, and Wind Shear) the enemy target is currently inflicted with, Advance Forward all allies' actions by 4%.
612224.simple_desc: After using a Path Resonance, for every type of debuff (out of Burn, Shock, Bleed, and Wind Shear) the enemy target is currently inflicted with, Advance Forward all allies' actions.

612225.name: Resonance Interplay: White Nights
612225.desc: A character's Basic ATK can cause all DoTs currently applied on the target via Path Resonance: Nihility to immediately deal DMG equivalent to 40% of these statuses' original DMG.
612225.simple_desc: Basic ATK can additionally trigger the DoT of Path Resonance: Nihility.

612226.name: Resonance Interplay: Reign of Keys
612226.desc: Path Resonance deals 30% more DMG to Frozen enemies. When enemy targets become Frozen, DoTs applied by the Path Resonance extend their duration by 1 turn(s).
612226.simple_desc: The DoT effects from the Path Resonance deal more DMG to Frozen enemies and have their duration extended.

612227.name: Resonance Interplay: Terror and Tremble
612227.desc: For each unique Type of non-DoT DMG the enemy target has taken, Path Resonance deals 6% more DMG to it, lasting until the end of the turn.
612227.simple_desc: Path Resonance deals more DMG for each unique type of non-DoT DMG the target has taken.

612320.name: Path Resonance: Abundance
612320.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Abundance, restore HP for all allies by 50% of their respective Max HP, and increases their respective Max HP by 15% for 2 turn(s).
612320.simple_desc: After using Path Resonance, restores all allies' HP and increases their respective Max HP.
612320.desc_battle: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Abundance, restore HP for all allies by 50% of their respective Max HP, and increases their respective Max HP by 15% for 2 turn(s).

612321.name: Resonance Formation: Terminal Nirvana
612321.desc: When any ally receives lethal DMG, the Resonance of Path of Abundance prevents them from being knocked down and automatically consumes all Energy to release Path Resonance. This effect can trigger up to 1 time(s) per battle.
612321.simple_desc: When characters receive lethal DMG, they will not be knocked down and will automatically activate Path Resonance (consuming all Energy) instead. This effect can be triggered a limited amount of times per battle.
612321.desc_battle: When any ally receives lethal DMG, the Resonance of Path of Abundance prevents them from being knocked down and automatically consumes all Energy to release Path Resonance. This effect can trigger up to 1 time(s) per battle.

612322.name: Resonance Formation: Anicca
612322.desc: After releasing a Path Resonance, removes all characters' debuffs and applies 1 stack(s) of <u>Subduing Evils</u> for 1 turn(s).
612322.simple_desc: After using the Path Resonance, remove debuffs from all characters and apply <u>Subduing Evils</u>.
612322.desc_battle: After releasing a Path Resonance, removes all characters' debuffs and applies 1 stack(s) of <u>Subduing Evils</u> for 1 turn(s).

612323.name: Resonance Formation: Anatta
612323.desc: After Path Resonance Energy is consumed for the first time in battle for the use of Path Resonance, the Path Resonance for Abundance will appear on the action order. The Outgoing Healing provided by this Resonance decreases by 30%. When this Resonance takes action, it will automatically release Path Resonance to heal allies.
612323.simple_desc: After using Path Resonance for the first time in a battle, Path Resonance: Abundance will appear on the action order.
612323.desc_battle: After Path Resonance Energy is consumed for the first time in battle for the use of Path Resonance, the Path Resonance for Abundance will appear on the action order. The Outgoing Healing provided by this Resonance decreases by 30%. When this Resonance takes action, it will automatically release Path Resonance to heal allies.

612324.name: Resonance Interplay: Mountain High
612324.desc: After a character has their HP restored via Path Resonance and if the healing amount exceeds the maximum HP, recover 1 Skill Point. This effect can only trigger 1 time per Path Resonance use. After triggering this effect, all DMG dealt by all allies is increased by 30% for 2 turns. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).
612324.simple_desc: When a Path Resonance overheals, recovers 1 Skill Point and increases all allies' DMG.

612325.name: Resonance Interplay: Nullifying Ardor
612325.desc: After using Path Resonance, all allies' Weakness Break Efficiency increases by 15% and Break Effect increases by 50%. This effect lasts for 2 turn(s) and stacks up to 2 time(s).
612325.simple_desc: After using a Path Resonance, increases all allies' Weakness Break efficiency and Break Effect.

612326.name: Resonance Interplay: Fleeting Samadhi
612326.desc: For every 1% of healing from Path Resonance that exceeds a character's Max HP, the character's Ultimate deals 1% more DMG. This effect is stackable, up to a maximum of 100%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
612326.simple_desc: Exceeded healing from Path Resonance increases characters' Ultimate DMG.

612327.name: Resonance Interplay: Destined Death
612327.desc: Healing from Path Resonance that exceeds a character's Max HP is stored and will be released as automatic healing when the character's HP falls below 35% of their Max HP. Up to 50% of the character's Max HP (when the Path Resonance is used) can be stored.
612327.simple_desc: Exceeded healing from the Path Resonance is stored and will be released when the character's HP falls below 35%.

612420.name: Path Resonance: The Hunt
612420.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of The Hunt, dealing Wind DMG to all enemies based on the current ATK of the character currently with the highest ATK.
612420.simple_desc: After using the Path Resonance, deals Wind DMG to all enemy units based on the ATK of the character with the highest ATK on the team.
612420.desc_battle: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of The Hunt, dealing Wind DMG to all enemies based on the current ATK of the character currently with the highest ATK.

612421.name: Resonance Formation: Star Hunter
612421.desc: When using Path Resonance, the ally with the highest ATK will be given a turn instantly and be granted <u>Light-Hunting Celestial Arrow</u>, lasting until this ally uses any ability.
612421.simple_desc: When using the Path Resonance, the character with the highest ATK will instantly act and become <u>Light-Hunting Celestial Arrow</u>.
612421.desc_battle: When using Path Resonance, the ally with the highest ATK will be given a turn instantly and be granted <u>Light-Hunting Celestial Arrow</u>, lasting until this ally uses any ability.

612422.name: Resonance Formation: Bow and Arrow
612422.desc: When Path Resonance: The Hunt deals damage, enemies whose HP is lower than 50% are guaranteed to receive CRIT Hits, with the CRIT DMG at 50%. When the enemy is defeated, regenerates 50% Energy.
612422.simple_desc: Attacks from Path Resonance: The Hunt are guaranteed to CRIT against enemies with HP lower than 50%. Path Resonance: The Hunt regenerates energy if it defeats an enemy.
612422.desc_battle: When Path Resonance: The Hunt deals damage, enemies whose HP is lower than 50% are guaranteed to receive CRIT Hits, with the CRIT DMG at 50%. When the enemy is defeated, regenerates 50% Energy.

612423.name: Resonance Formation: Perfect Aim
612423.desc: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from 100 to 200 points. When an ally's turn starts, additionally regenerates 3% Energy for Path Resonance.
612423.simple_desc: Doubles the Energy limit of Path Resonance. Path Resonance regenerates Energy at the start of every character's turn.
612423.desc_battle: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from 100 to 200 points. When an ally's turn starts, additionally regenerates 3% Energy for Path Resonance.

612424.name: Resonance Interplay: Startling Breeze
612424.desc: After using Path Resonance, all allies' SPD increases by 25 for 2 turn(s). This effect also applies to units summoned by allies.
612424.simple_desc: After using a Path Resonance, increases all allies' SPD. This effect also applies to units summoned by allies.

612425.name: Resonance Interplay: Shooting Starfire
612425.desc: After enemy target(s) are defeated by a Path Resonance, restores all allies' HP equal to 50% of their respective Max HP.
612425.simple_desc: After a Path Resonance defeats an enemy, restores all allies' HP.

612426.name: Resonance Interplay: Solemn Snare
612426.desc: For every Skill Point recovered by allies, the next Path Resonance deals 20% more DMG, stacking up to 8 time(s).
612426.simple_desc: Gaining Skill Points increases the DMG for Path Resonance's attack.

612427.name: Resonance Interplay: Waiting with Drawn Bow
612427.desc: When using Path Resonance, allies' Shield duration extends by 5 turn(s).
612427.simple_desc: When using Path Resonance, extends characters' Shield duration.

612520.name: Path Resonance: Destruction
612520.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Destruction, dealing Fire DMG to all enemies based on the current HP difference between Max HP and current HP for all allies combined.
612520.simple_desc: After using the Path Resonance, deals Fire DMG to all enemies based on the HP difference between all allies' Max HP and their current HP.
612520.desc_battle: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Destruction, dealing Fire DMG to all enemies based on the current HP difference between Max HP and current HP for all allies combined.

612521.name: Resonance Formation: Cataclysmic Variable
612521.desc: Using a Path Resonance will consume HP from all allies up to 40% of their respective Max HP, increasing the DMG of Path Resonance: Destruction by 20%. The amount of HP consumed will be converted into a Shield lasting for 2 turn(s), with the same Shield value as the HP lost.
612521.simple_desc: After using the Path Resonance, consume characters' HP and turn the value into Shields. The DMG of Path Resonance: Destruction increases.
612521.desc_battle: Using a Path Resonance will consume HP from all allies up to 40% of their respective Max HP, increasing the DMG of Path Resonance: Destruction by 20%. The amount of HP consumed will be converted into a Shield lasting for 2 turn(s), with the same Shield value as the HP lost.

612522.name: Resonance Formation: Extreme Helium Flash
612522.desc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Destruction have a 150% base chance to inflict <u>Entropic Retribution</u> on the enemy target for 2 turn(s).
612522.simple_desc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Destruction have a high chance to apply <u>Entropic Retribution</u> on enemies.
612522.desc_battle: The attacks of Path Resonance: Destruction have a 150% base chance to inflict <u>Entropic Retribution</u> on the enemy target for 2 turn(s).

612523.name: Resonance Formation: Event Horizon
612523.desc: When an ally whose current HP is below 35% gets attacked, automatically releases 1 Path Resonance without consuming Energy. This effect can be triggered up to a max of 2 time(s) in a single battle and cannot be triggered multiple times by the same attack.
612523.simple_desc: When a character is hit and their HP is lower than 35% of their Max HP, Path Resonance will be used 1 time at no cost.
612523.desc_battle: When an ally whose current HP is below 35% gets attacked, automatically releases 1 Path Resonance without consuming Energy. This effect can be triggered up to a max of 2 time(s) in a single battle and cannot be triggered multiple times by the same attack.

612524.name: Resonance Interplay: Substellar Belt
612524.desc: Using Path Resonance will cause any character with current HP percentage lower than 50% to gain a Shield equal to 40% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).
612524.simple_desc: After using a Path Resonance, grants a Shield to a character with current HP percentage lower than 50%.

612525.name: Resonance Interplay: Zero Age Main Sequence
612525.desc: When a character launches a follow-up attack, regenerates 5% Energy for Path Resonance. If the character's current HP percentage is lower than 50%, additionally regenerates 5% Energy for Path Resonance.
612525.simple_desc: When a character launches a follow-up attack, Path Resonance regenerates Energy. If the character's HP is lower than 50%, increases the amount of Energy regenerated.

612526.name: Resonance Interplay: Nuclear Implosion
612526.desc: When using Path Resonance to attack, additionally deals a set amount of DMG to all enemy targets whose HP is below 20% of their Max HP, reducing these targets' HP to 1.
612526.simple_desc: When using Path Resonance to attack, if an enemy's HP is lower than 20% of their Max HP, their remaining HP is reduced to 1.

612527.name: Resonance Interplay: Protostar
612527.desc: After losing HP due to allies or Path Resonance effects, the characters gain Healing Over Time that lasts 2 turn(s). At the start of every turn, restore HP equal to 30% of the consumed HP.
612527.simple_desc: When characters lose HP due to allies or Path Resonance effects, they restore HP over time.

612620.name: Path Resonance: Elation
612620.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Elation, dealing follow-up attacks of a random Type to all enemies for 3 – 5 time(s).
612620.simple_desc: After using Path Resonance, deals a random number of follow-up attacks of random Types to all enemies.
612620.desc_battle: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Elation, dealing follow-up attacks of a random Type to all enemies for 3 – 5 time(s).

612621.name: Resonance Formation: Doomsday Carnival
612621.desc: When Path Resonance: Elation deals DMG, there is a 150% base chance to apply <u>Sensory Pursuit</u> to enemies for 1 turn.
612621.simple_desc: Every time Path Resonance deals DMG, there is a high chance to apply <u>Sensory Pursuit</u> to the target enemy.
612621.desc_battle: When Path Resonance: Elation deals DMG, there is a 150% base chance to apply <u>Sensory Pursuit</u> to enemies for 1 turn.

612622.name: Resonance Formation: Dance of Growth
612622.desc: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from 100 to 200 points. Using abilities to resonate with a Path will consume all Energy. For every 20% Energy consumed that exceeds the original limit, attacks will deal DMG for 1 extra time.
612622.simple_desc: Doubles the Energy limit of Path Resonance. When using Path Resonance, consume all Energy to increase the number of damaging hits from the Resonance.
612622.desc_battle: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from 100 to 200 points. Using abilities to resonate with a Path will consume all Energy. For every 20% Energy consumed that exceeds the original limit, attacks will deal DMG for 1 extra time.

612623.name: Resonance Formation: Instant Win
612623.desc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates 40% Energy. When a character launches a follow-up attack, Path Resonance additionally regenerates 5% Energy.
612623.simple_desc: When entering battle, Path Resonances regenerates energy. When characters launch follow-up attacks, Path Resonances regenerates energy.
612623.desc_battle: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates 40% Energy. When a character launches a follow-up attack, Path Resonance additionally regenerates 5% Energy.

612624.name: Resonance Interplay: The Taste of Anglerfish
612624.desc: When Path Resonance: Elation deals DMG, randomly dispels 1 debuff on 1 ally.
612624.simple_desc: When Path Resonance: Elation deals DMG, randomly dispels the debuffs on a character.

612625.name: Resonance Interplay: Guinea Pig in Ice Coffin
612625.desc: When Path Resonance: Elation deals Ice DMG, there is a 150% base chance to Freeze the enemy target for 1 turn(s).
612625.simple_desc: When Path Resonance: Elation deals Ice DMG, there is a high chance to Freeze the enemy.

612626.name: Resonance Interplay: Unending Night
612626.desc: When Path Resonance deals Fire/Wind/Physical/Lightning DMG, there is a 50% base chance to apply a DoT of the same Type, lasting for 1 turns.
612626.simple_desc: When the Path Resonance deals Fire, Wind, Physical or Lightning DMG, there is a chance inflict the DoT effect of the same type.

612627.name: Resonance Interplay: Pit and Pendulum
612627.desc: When using the Path Resonance, for every 20 Energy consumed, the ally with the highest ATK and all units summoned by allies will have their action Advanced Forward by 10%.
612627.simple_desc: Based on the amount of Energy used, Path Resonance advances the actions of the ally with the highest ATK and all units summoned by allies.

612720.name: Path Resonance: Propagation
612720.desc: Consumes 100 Energy to resonate with the Path of Propagation and allows a target ally to immediately take action, recover 2 Skill Point(s) and become affected by <u>Metamorphosis</u>. <u>Metamorphosis</u> lasts for 1 turn and only takes effect on the latest target.
612720.simple_desc: After using a Path Resonance, a target ally immediately takes action, recovering 2 Skill Point(s) and activating <u>Metamorphosis</u>.
612720.desc_battle: Consumes 100 Energy to resonate with the Path of Propagation and allows a target ally to immediately take action, recover 2 Skill Point(s) and become affected by <u>Metamorphosis</u>. <u>Metamorphosis</u> lasts for 1 turn and only takes effect on the latest target.

612721.name: Resonance Formation: Proboscis
612721.desc: Extends the duration of <u>Metamorphosis</u> for 1 turn. After a character with <u>Metamorphosis</u> defeats an enemy, Path Resonance regenerates 20% Energy.
612721.simple_desc: The duration of <u>Metamorphosis</u> is extended for 1 turn. After a character with <u>Metamorphosis</u> defeats an enemy, Path Resonance regenerates Energy.
612721.desc_battle: Extends the duration of <u>Metamorphosis</u> for 1 turn. After a character with <u>Metamorphosis</u> defeats an enemy, Path Resonance regenerates 20% Energy.

612722.name: Resonance Formation: Phenol Compounds
612722.desc: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from 100 to 200 points. After a character consumes or recovers Skill Points, additionally regenerates 1.0% Energy for Path Resonance.
612722.simple_desc: Path Resonance's Energy limit is doubled. After a character consumes or recovers Skill Points, Path Resonance regenerates energy.
612722.desc_battle: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from 100 to 200 points. After a character consumes or recovers Skill Points, additionally regenerates 1.0% Energy for Path Resonance.

612723.name: Resonance Formation: Crystal Pincers
612723.desc: <u>Metamorphosis</u> additionally increases DMG dealt by a character by 40%. Only when a character is under the <u>Metamorphosis</u> effect can they cause <u>Spores</u> to burst. Every time a character causes a <u>Spore</u> to burst, additionally deal Basic ATK DMG equal to 80% of the character's ATK. This effect can trigger up to 3 time(s) on the same target.
612723.simple_desc: Increases DMG dealt by characters with <u>Metamorphosis</u>. Only this type of character can cause <u>Spores</u> to burst, dealing additional DMG after bursting.
612723.desc_battle: <u>Metamorphosis</u> additionally increases DMG dealt by a character by 40%. Only when a character is under the <u>Metamorphosis</u> effect can they cause <u>Spores</u> to burst. Every time a character causes a <u>Spore</u> to burst, additionally deal Basic ATK DMG equal to 80% of the character's ATK. This effect can trigger up to 3 time(s) on the same target.

612724.name: Resonance Interplay: Superposition Eye
612724.desc: After using Path Resonance, nullifies all DMG received by a single target ally except DoT. This status is dispelled after being attacked. If the target ally's current HP percentage is lower than 50% when Path Resonance is used, it will additionally recover 1 Skill Point(s).
612724.simple_desc: After using a Path Resonance, make a target ally able to Block 1 attack. If that ally's HP is lower than 50%, recover 1 Skill Point(s).

612725.name: Resonance Interplay: Adherent Microbial Mat
612725.desc: When using Path Resonance, a single target ally gain a Shield equal to 60% of Max HP, lasting for 3 turn(s).
612725.simple_desc: When using a Path Resonance, grants Shield to a target ally.

612726.name: Resonance Interplay: Compounded Macrospore
612726.desc: When using Path Resonance, heals the target ally for 50% of their Max HP. 200% of the healing that exceeds Max HP will be evenly distributed among other characters.
612726.simple_desc: When using Path Resonance, heals a target ally. Any exceeded Healing will be distributed to heal other allies.

612727.name: Resonance Interplay: Condensation Cavity
612727.desc: Characters in the <u>Metamorphosis</u> status deal 20% more DMG to Frozen enemies. In addition, their attacks have a 10% base chance to Freeze hit targets for 1 turns.
612727.simple_desc: Characters in the <u>Metamorphosis</u> state deal more DMG to Frozen enemies. In addition, their attacks have a low chance of Freezing the target.

612820.name: Path Resonance: "Erudition"
612820.desc: Consume 100 Energy to resonate with the Path of Erudition. Path Resonance links the enemy with the highest Max HP with other enemies, inflicting <u>Synapse Resonance</u> on all enemies and dealing Imaginary DMG to them.
612820.simple_desc: Path Resonance inflicts <u>Synapse Resonance</u> on all enemies and deal Imaginary DMG to them.

612821.name: Resonance Formation: Melt Core
612821.desc: When an enemy target with <u>Synapse Resonance</u> is attacked by Ultimate, the enemy target with the highest Max HP takes increased DMG equal to 50% of the attacking character's ATK.
612821.simple_desc: When <u>Synapse Resonance</u> is triggered by an Ultimate, it will deal more DMG to the enemy with the highest Max HP.

612822.name: Resonance Formation: Chain Contagion
612822.desc: When characters defeat an enemy with <u>Synapse Resonance</u>, the effect is additionally triggered for 2 time(s).
612822.simple_desc: When characters defeat an enemy with <u>Synapse Resonance</u>, the effect is additionally triggered for 2 time(s).

612823.name: Resonance Formation: Memetic Inversion
612823.desc: When an enemy target appears, regenerates Path Resonance Energy equal to 5.0% of the combined Max Energy of all characters.
612823.simple_desc: Regenerates Path Resonance Energy upon encountering enemies.

612826.name: Resonance Interplay: Full Scan
612826.desc: When enemies with <u>Synapse Resonance</u> are attacked by follow-up attacks, the effect is additionally triggered 1 time and the available <u>Synapse Resonance</u> count is not reduced.
612826.simple_desc: When enemies with <u>Synapse Resonance</u> are attacked by follow-up attacks, the effect is additionally triggered once and its available count is not reduced.

612827.name: Resonance Interplay: Data Reinforcement
612827.desc: Attacks against Weakness Broken enemies do not reduce the available <u>Synapse Resonance</u> count.
612827.simple_desc: Attacks against Weakness Broken enemies do not reduce the available <u>Synapse Resonance</u> count.

612030.name: Divine Construct: Resonance Transfer
612030.desc: After a character launches an attack, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG equal to 100% of the character's current Shield to the hit enemies.
612030.simple_desc: After attacking enemies, the attacking character deals <u>Quake</u> DMG based on the current Shield effect on the character.
612030.desc_battle: After a character launches an attack, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG equal to 100% of the character's current Shield to the hit enemies.

612031.name: Divine Construct: Metastatic Field
612031.desc: After a character is hit, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG to the attacker, equal to 340% of the character's current Shield effect. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.
612031.simple_desc: After a character is hit by an attack, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG based on the current Shield effect on the attacked character.
612031.desc_battle: After a character is hit, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG to the attacker, equal to 340% of the character's current Shield effect. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.

612032.name: Divine Construct: Macrosegregation
612032.desc: At the start of the battle, characters gain a special Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 1% of their Max HP. Whenever another Shield is gained, this special Shield will also strengthen in equal value. For every 2 turn(s), this will be removed, and then this special Shield can be regained.
612032.simple_desc: When entering battle, characters gain a stackable special Shield. This Shield is reset every 2 turn(s).
612032.desc_battle: At the start of the battle, characters gain a special Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 1% of their Max HP. Whenever another Shield is gained, this special Shield will also strengthen in equal value. For every 2 turn(s), this will be removed, and then this special Shield can be regained.

612040.name: Interstellar Construct: Shear Structure
612040.desc: Characters deal 10% increased <u>Quake</u> DMG to their target enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also take <u>Quake</u> DMG equal to 25% of DMG dealt to the target enemy.
612040.simple_desc: <u>Quake</u> DMG increases and affects enemies adjacent to the target enemy.
612040.desc_battle: Characters deal 10% increased <u>Quake</u> DMG to their target enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also take <u>Quake</u> DMG equal to 25% of DMG dealt to the target enemy.

612041.name: Interstellar Construct: Burst Lattice
612041.desc: When a character deals <u>Quake</u> DMG to an enemy target, there is a 65% base chance to cause the target to Bleed.
612041.simple_desc: <u>Quake</u> has a chance of applying Bleed on the enemy.
612041.desc_battle: When a character deals <u>Quake</u> DMG to an enemy target, there is a 65% base chance to cause the target to Bleed.

612042.name: Interstellar Construct: Solid Solution
612042.desc: Deals increased <u>Quake</u> DMG to enemies. The amount of DMG increased is equal to 80% of the character's current DEF.
612042.simple_desc: The DMG <u>Quake</u> deals increases with the character's DEF.
612042.desc_battle: Deals increased <u>Quake</u> DMG to enemies. The amount of DMG increased is equal to 80% of the character's current DEF.

612043.name: Interstellar Construct: Safe Load
612043.desc: Shielded characters increase their ATK by 40% of the Shield effect on them, up to a maximum of 120% of their Base ATK.
612043.simple_desc: Shielded characters increase their ATK based on the max DMG that can be absorbed by their current Shields.
612043.desc_battle: Shielded characters increase their ATK by 40% of the Shield effect on them, up to a maximum of 120% of their Base ATK.

612044.name: Interstellar Construct: Sanctuary
612044.desc: At the end of the turn, there is 80% fixed chance for characters to gain a Shield equal to 12% of their Max HP, lasting for 1 turn(s).
612044.simple_desc: Characters have a high chance of receiving a Shield at the end of the turn.
612044.desc_battle: At the end of the turn, there is 80% fixed chance for characters to gain a Shield equal to 12% of their Max HP, lasting for 1 turn(s).

612045.name: Interstellar Construct: Quadrangular Pyramid
612045.desc: Increase the max DMG that can be absorbed by Shields created by characters by 30%.
612045.simple_desc: Increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by Shields created by characters.
612045.desc_battle: Increase the max DMG that can be absorbed by Shields created by characters by 30%.

612046.name: Interstellar Construct: Hypoeutectoid
612046.desc: When a character provides Shields to allies, this character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 24% of the provided Shield for 2 turn(s).
612046.simple_desc: Characters also receive a Shield when creating Shield(s) for allied targets.
612046.desc_battle: When a character provides Shields to allies, this character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 24% of the provided Shield for 2 turn(s).

612050.name: Construct: Assemble
612050.desc: Characters gain a 6% DEF increase for each Preservation Blessing, stacking up to a max of 6 time(s).
612050.simple_desc: The more Blessings of Preservation the team has, the higher the characters' DEF becomes.
612050.desc_battle: Characters gain a 6% DEF increase for each Preservation Blessing, stacking up to a max of 6 time(s).

612051.name: Construct: Sentinel
612051.desc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield equal to 16% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).
612051.simple_desc: When entering battle, all characters gain a Shield.
612051.desc_battle: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield equal to 16% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).

612052.name: Construct: Patch
612052.desc: After a character is attacked, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 18% of the HP lost during this attack, lasting for 1 turn(s).
612052.simple_desc: After being hit, characters gain a Shield based on the HP lost in this attack.
612052.desc_battle: After a character is attacked, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 18% of the HP lost during this attack, lasting for 1 turn(s).

612053.name: Construct: Compensation
612053.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 14% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).
612053.simple_desc: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on a target, the character gains a Shield.
612053.desc_battle: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 14% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).

612055.name: Construct: Rotation
612055.desc: When a character gains a Shield, there is a 20% fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff that is currently placed on the character.
612055.simple_desc: When a character receives a shield, there is a small chance of removing a debuff currently on them.
612055.desc_battle: When a character gains a Shield, there is a 20% fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff that is currently placed on the character.

612056.name: Construct: Burst
612056.desc: Increases the CRIT DMG of Shielded characters by 30%.
612056.simple_desc: Shielded Characters have increased CRIT DMG.
612056.desc_battle: Increases the CRIT DMG of Shielded characters by 30%.

612057.name: Construct: Concentration
612057.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of Shielded characters by 16%.
612057.simple_desc: Shielded Characters have increased CRIT Rate.
612057.desc_battle: Increases the CRIT Rate of Shielded characters by 16%.

612130.name: Perfect Experience: Fuli
612130.desc: When attacking Frozen enemies, there is a 100% base chance to inflict <u>Dissociation</u> for 1 turn(s).
612130.simple_desc: After attacking a Frozen enemy, apply <u>Dissociation</u> on them.
612130.desc_battle: When attacking Frozen enemies, there is a 100% base chance to inflict <u>Dissociation</u> for 1 turn(s).

612131.name: Perfect Experience: Innocence
612131.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, there is a 100% base chance to apply <u>Dissociation</u> on the enemy for 1 turn(s).
612131.simple_desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, apply <u>Dissociation</u> on them.
612131.desc_battle: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, there is a 100% base chance to apply <u>Dissociation</u> on the enemy for 1 turn(s).

612132.name: Perfect Experience: Reticence
612132.desc: After an enemy is attacked 6 time(s), they have a 120% base chance to become Frozen for 1 turn(s).
612132.simple_desc: The enemy has a high chance to become Frozen for every 6 attack(s) it receives.
612132.desc_battle: After an enemy is attacked 6 time(s), they have a 120% base chance to become Frozen for 1 turn(s).

612140.name: Ultimate Experience: Melancholia
612140.desc: Attacking an enemy with <u>Dissociation</u> will remove <u>Dissociation</u>, and deal DMG equal to 150% of the <u>Dissociation</u> removal DMG.
612140.simple_desc: When a character attacks an enemy with <u>Dissociation</u>, remove <u>Dissociation</u> from the enemy and increase the DMG received when this status is removed.
612140.desc_battle: Attacking an enemy with <u>Dissociation</u> will remove <u>Dissociation</u>, and deal DMG equal to 150% of the <u>Dissociation</u> removal DMG.

612141.name: Ultimate Experience: Dizziness
612141.desc: Increases the DMG taken by enemies with <u>Dissociation</u> by 36%. This effect will remain for 1 turn after <u>Dissociation</u> is removed.
612141.desc_battle: Increases the DMG taken by enemies with <u>Dissociation</u> by 36%. This effect will remain for 1 turn after <u>Dissociation</u> is removed.

612142.name: Ultimate Experience: Insensitivity
612142.desc: After <u>Dissociation</u> is removed from an enemy, there is a 50% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn(s).
612142.simple_desc: When <u>Dissociation</u> is removed from an enemy, there is a chance for them to become Frozen.
612142.desc_battle: After <u>Dissociation</u> is removed from an enemy, there is a 50% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn(s).

612143.name: Ultimate Experience: Sentimentality
612143.desc: After an enemy receives Ice DMG, enemies adjacent to it also receive DMG equal to 20% of the DMG taken by the target enemy.
612143.simple_desc: Ice DMG taken by enemies can affect enemies adjacent to the target enemy.
612143.desc_battle: After an enemy receives Ice DMG, enemies adjacent to it also receive DMG equal to 20% of the DMG taken by the target enemy.

612144.name: Ultimate Experience: Indelibility
612144.desc: When a character deals DMG to an enemy, there's a 2.0% base chance to Freeze the hit enemy for 1 turn(s).
612144.simple_desc: When characters deal DMG to enemies, there is a small chance to Freeze the enemy.
612144.desc_battle: When a character deals DMG to an enemy, there's a 2.0% base chance to Freeze the hit enemy for 1 turn(s).

612145.name: Ultimate Experience: Shudder
612145.desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, there is a 70% base chance to apply Ice Weakness to a random enemy for 2 turn(s).
612145.simple_desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, a random enemy gains Ice Weakness.
612145.desc_battle: After a character uses their Ultimate, there is a 70% base chance to apply Ice Weakness to a random enemy for 2 turn(s).

612146.name: Ultimate Experience: Maverick
612146.desc: Upon entering battle, there is a 150% base chance for all enemies to become Frozen for 1 turn(s).
612146.simple_desc: Upon entering battle, there is a high chance of inflicting Freeze on all enemies.
612146.desc_battle: Upon entering battle, there is a 150% base chance for all enemies to become Frozen for 1 turn(s).

612150.name: Experience: Unspeakable Shame
612150.desc: For every Blessing of Remembrance the team has, enemies' chance to resist Frozen decreases by 6%, stacking up to 6 time(s).
612150.simple_desc: The more Blessings of Remembrance the team has, the lower the enemy's Freeze RES become.
612150.desc_battle: For every Blessing of Remembrance the team has, enemies' chance to resist Frozen decreases by 6%, stacking up to 6 time(s).

612151.name: Experience: The Torment of Alienation
612151.desc: Characters' Effect Hit Rate increases by 16%.
612151.desc_battle: Characters' Effect Hit Rate increases by 16%.

612152.name: Experience: Lost Memory
612152.desc: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP to a point that is lower than 50% for the first time in this battle, there's a 70% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn(s).
612152.simple_desc: Enemies have a chance of becoming Frozen when they fall to low health from characters' attacks.
612152.desc_battle: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP to a point that is lower than 50% for the first time in this battle, there's a 70% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn(s).

612153.name: Experience: Stone Cold Hatred
612153.desc: When a character uses their Skill or Ultimate to attack a Frozen enemy, DMG for this attack increases by 36%.
612153.simple_desc: Characters' Skill and Ultimate deal increased DMG against Frozen enemies.
612153.desc_battle: When a character uses their Skill or Ultimate to attack a Frozen enemy, DMG for this attack increases by 36%.

612154.name: Experience: Pain & Suffering
612154.desc: Right after an enemy is Frozen, the next 1 attack(s) launched against the said enemy will have 100% increased CRIT Rate. This effect is dispelled when the Frozen state is removed.
612154.simple_desc: After an enemy is Frozen, the next 1 attack(s) they receive are guaranteed to CRIT.
612154.desc_battle: Right after an enemy is Frozen, the next 1 attack(s) launched against the said enemy will have 100% increased CRIT Rate. This effect is dispelled when the Frozen state is removed.

612155.name: Experience: Primordial Hardship
612155.desc: Increases the DMG taken by Frozen enemies by 16%.
612155.simple_desc: DMG taken by Frozen enemies increases.
612155.desc_battle: Increases the DMG taken by Frozen enemies by 16%.

612156.name: Experience: Thrill of Escalation
612156.desc: When a character Freezes an enemy, regenerates 8 Energy. This effect may only trigger once per action.
612156.simple_desc: Characters regenerate Energy when they apply Freeze on enemies.
612156.desc_battle: When a character Freezes an enemy, regenerates 8 Energy. This effect may only trigger once per action.

612157.name: Experience: Responsive Excitement
612157.desc: When a character applies Freeze to an enemy, the character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 16% of their Max HP for 3 turn(s).
612157.simple_desc: Characters gain a Shield when they apply Freeze on enemies.
612157.desc_battle: When a character applies Freeze to an enemy, the character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 16% of their Max HP for 3 turn(s).

612230.name: Funeral of Sensory Pursuivant
612230.desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, applies 1 stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u>.
612230.simple_desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, apply 1 stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u> on them.
612230.desc_battle: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, applies 1 stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u>.

612231.name: The Man in the Cover
612231.desc: Every time an enemy is afflicted with a DoT, apply 3 stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u>.
612231.simple_desc: Every time an enemy is afflicted with a DoT state, apply 3 stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u> on them.
612231.desc_battle: Every time an enemy is afflicted with a DoT, apply 3 stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u>.

612232.name: Why Hasn't Everything Already Disappeared?
612232.desc: At the beginning of an enemy's turn, trigger extra DoT 1 times, dealing DMG equal to 90% of the original DoT.
612232.simple_desc: At the start of an enemy's turn, all DoT sources on it are triggered 1 extra time(s).
612232.desc_battle: At the beginning of an enemy's turn, trigger extra DoT 1 times, dealing DMG equal to 90% of the original DoT.

612240.name: Beginning and End
612240.desc: When an enemy inflicted with <u>Suspicion</u> is defeated, inflicts the same number of stacks of <u>Suspicion</u> the defeated enemy has on 1 random enemy target(s).
612240.simple_desc: When an enemy afflicted with <u>Suspicion</u> is defeated, transfers the defeated enemy's <u>Suspicion</u> stacks to 1 random enemy target(s).
612240.desc_battle: When an enemy inflicted with <u>Suspicion</u> is defeated, inflicts the same number of stacks of <u>Suspicion</u> the defeated enemy has on 1 random enemy target(s).

612241.name: Café Self-Deceit
612241.desc: When an enemy has <u>Suspicion</u> on them, inflicts 1 extra stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u>.
612241.simple_desc: When an enemy becomes afflicted with <u>Suspicion</u>, apply 1 extra stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u> on them.
612241.desc_battle: When an enemy has <u>Suspicion</u> on them, inflicts 1 extra stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u>.

612242.name: Call of the Wilderness
612242.desc: For every stack of <u>Suspicion</u> the enemies have, reduces their ATK by 0.3%, up to a max of 30%.
612242.simple_desc: Decreases the target enemy's ATK based on the total stacks of <u>Suspicion</u> on the enemy team.
612242.desc_battle: For every stack of <u>Suspicion</u> the enemies have, reduces their ATK by 0.3%, up to a max of 30%.

612244.name: Hell is Other People
612244.desc: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the same type of Weakness Break effect is applied to enemies adjacent to it.
612244.simple_desc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, enemies adjacent to it will also have their Weaknesses Broken.
612244.desc_battle: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the same type of Weakness Break effect is applied to enemies adjacent to it.

612245.name: Twilight of Existence
612245.desc: When hitting a Weakness Broken enemy, there is a 75% base chance to apply Burn, Shock, Bleed, or Wind Shear on the enemy for 2 turn(s).
612245.simple_desc: If an enemy's Weakness is Broken after receiving an attack, there is a chance for them to be inflicted with a random DoT.
612245.desc_battle: When hitting a Weakness Broken enemy, there is a 75% base chance to apply Burn, Shock, Bleed, or Wind Shear on the enemy for 2 turn(s).

612246.name: All Things are Possible
612246.desc: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to 100% of the DoT.
612246.simple_desc: If an enemy is under any DoT status when receiving an attack, they will take DMG from a random DoT on them.
612246.desc_battle: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to 100% of the DoT.

612250.name: Ignosticism
612250.desc: Gains a 6% DoT increase for each Nihility Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of 6 time(s).
612250.simple_desc: The more Blessings of Nihility the team has, the higher the characters' DoT becomes.
612250.desc_battle: Gains a 6% DoT increase for each Nihility Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of 6 time(s).

612253.name: Tragic Lecture
612253.desc: Increases DoT taken by enemies by 10%.
612253.simple_desc: Enemies take increased DMG from DoTs.
612253.desc_battle: Increases DoT taken by enemies by 10%.

612254.name: Sensory Labyrinth
612254.desc: Extends the duration of Wind Shear, Bleed, Shock, and Burn on enemies by 1 turn(s).
612254.simple_desc: Extends the duration of Wind Shear, Bleed, Shock, and Burn on enemies by 1 turn(s).
612254.desc_battle: Extends the duration of Wind Shear, Bleed, Shock, and Burn on enemies by 1 turn(s).

612255.name: Emotional Decluttering
612255.desc: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by 3%. This effect can stack up to 4 time(s).
612255.simple_desc: The more DoTs the enemy has, the more DMG they will receive from all sources.
612255.desc_battle: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by 3%. This effect can stack up to 4 time(s).

612256.name: Offerings of Deception
612256.desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to 1.0% of their respective Max HP.
612256.simple_desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all characters restore HP.
612256.desc_battle: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to 1.0% of their respective Max HP.

612257.name: Before Sunrise
612257.desc: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, 2 Energy is regenerated for a random ally.
612257.simple_desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, a random ally regenerates Energy.
612257.desc_battle: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, 2 Energy is regenerated for a random ally.

612330.name: Prosperity, Longevity
