612330.simple_desc: When a character's HP is restored, <u>Dewdrop</u> is Charged according to the amount of healing received.
612330.desc_battle: Charges <u>Dewdrop</u> when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to 100% of the amount of healing received.

612331.name: Mudra of Blessing
612331.desc: Charges <u>Dewdrop</u> at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to 60% of their current HP.
612331.simple_desc: When a character's turn begins, <u>Dewdrop</u> is Charged based on the character's current HP.
612331.desc_battle: Charges <u>Dewdrop</u> at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to 60% of their current HP.

612332.name: Being of Abundance, Becoming One Mind
612332.desc: When a character provides healing, allies other than the healed target will also gain HP equal to 30% of the Outgoing Healing.
612332.simple_desc: Healing effects provided by characters can be Blasted to all allies.
612332.desc_battle: When a character provides healing, allies other than the healed target will also gain HP equal to 30% of the Outgoing Healing.

612340.name: Good Deeds Come After Old Sins
612340.desc: Restores HP to the character equal to 20% of the Charge value when <u>Dewdrop</u> ruptures, up to 18% of the character's Max HP.
612340.simple_desc: Restores the character's HP when <u>Dewdrop</u> breaks.
612340.desc_battle: Restores HP to the character equal to 20% of the Charge value when <u>Dewdrop</u> ruptures, up to 18% of the character's Max HP.

612341.name: Mortals of the Buddha-Field
612341.desc: When a character's HP is full, increases the Charging Efficiency for <u>Dewdrop</u> by 80%.
612341.simple_desc: When a character's HP is full, <u>Dewdrop</u>'s Charging Efficiency increases.
612341.desc_battle: When a character's HP is full, increases the Charging Efficiency for <u>Dewdrop</u> by 80%.

612342.name: Salvation From Damnation
612342.desc: When a <u>Dewdrop</u> breaks, there is a 65% fixed chance to remove 1 debuff on the character.
612342.simple_desc: There is a chance of removing 1 debuff when <u>Dewdrop</u> breaks.
612342.desc_battle: When a <u>Dewdrop</u> breaks, there is a 65% fixed chance to remove 1 debuff on the character.

612343.name: Precious Moon-Like Candlelight
612343.desc: When a character provides healing to allies, increases the ATK of both units by 50% for 1 turn(s).
612343.simple_desc: When a character restores an ally's HP, both units' ATK increases.
612343.desc_battle: When a character provides healing to allies, increases the ATK of both units by 50% for 1 turn(s).

612344.name: Aversion to Suffering
612344.desc: After launching attacks, characters deal Additional DMG equal to 36% of their current HP.
612344.simple_desc: After a character uses an attack, they deal Additional DMG based on their current HP.
612344.desc_battle: After launching attacks, characters deal Additional DMG equal to 36% of their current HP.

612345.name: Clear Lucite Body
612345.desc: When a character's HP is full, reduces their DMG taken by 36%.
612345.simple_desc: When a character's HP is full, their DMG received is reduced.
612345.desc_battle: When a character's HP is full, reduces their DMG taken by 36%.

612346.name: Prajna Boat
612346.desc: When being healed by an ally, characters restore extra HP equal to 30% of the amount of HP healed.
612346.simple_desc: Characters that have their HP restored by an ally also restore extra HP.
612346.desc_battle: When being healed by an ally, characters restore extra HP equal to 30% of the amount of HP healed.

612350.name: Rain of Truth
612350.desc: For each Abundance Blessing, increase allies' respective Max HP by 5%. This effect can stack up to a max of 6 time(s).
612350.simple_desc: The more Blessings of Abundance the team has, the higher the characters' Max HP becomes.
612350.desc_battle: For each Abundance Blessing, increase allies' respective Max HP by 5%. This effect can stack up to a max of 6 time(s).

612351.name: Sweet Dew
612351.simple_desc: Increases the amount of HP restored by characters.

612352.name: Extended Life
612352.desc: Upon entering battle, characters restore HP equal to 24% of their Max HP.
612352.simple_desc: When entering battle, all characters restore HP.
612352.desc_battle: Upon entering battle, characters restore HP equal to 24% of their Max HP.

612353.name: Seal
612353.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP to the character equal to 16% of their Max HP.
612353.simple_desc: Characters restore HP after inflicting Weakness Break on enemies.
612353.desc_battle: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP to the character equal to 16% of their Max HP.

612354.name: Dispel Disaster
612354.desc: After a character is healed, increases their DEF by 24% for 1 turn(s).
612354.simple_desc: After having their HP restored, the character's DEF increases.
612354.desc_battle: After a character is healed, increases their DEF by 24% for 1 turn(s).

612355.name: Rebirth
612355.desc: After a character provides healing, they restore HP equal to 12% of their Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per action.
612355.simple_desc: After restoring an ally's HP, the healer character also restores HP.
612355.desc_battle: After a character provides healing, they restore HP equal to 12% of their Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per action.

612356.name: Victorious Force
612356.desc: After a character is healed, increases their SPD by 10% for 1 turn(s).
612356.simple_desc: After having their HP restored, the character's SPD increases.
612356.desc_battle: After a character is healed, increases their SPD by 10% for 1 turn(s).

612357.name: Blessing
612357.desc: After a character provides healing, there is a 30% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect can only trigger once per action.
612357.simple_desc: After restoring an ally's HP, there is a small chance of recovering a Skill Point.
612357.desc_battle: After a character provides healing, there is a 30% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect can only trigger once per action.

612430.name: Imperial Reign
612430.desc: When a character's turn begins, they gain 1 stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
612430.simple_desc: When a character's turn begins, they gain 1 stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
612430.desc_battle: When a character's turn begins, they gain 1 stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.

612431.name: Imperishable Victory
612431.desc: After a character defeats an enemy, their action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain 4 stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
612431.simple_desc: After defeating an enemy, the character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain 4 stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
612431.desc_battle: After a character defeats an enemy, their action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain 4 stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.

612432.name: Celestial Annihilation
612432.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by 100% and increases the DMG dealt by their next attack by 50%.
612432.simple_desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by 100% and increases the DMG dealt by their next attack.
612432.desc_battle: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by 100% and increases the DMG dealt by their next attack by 50%.

612440.name: Battle Against the Old Foe
612440.desc: If a character has higher than 100% CRIT Rate and currently has <u>Critical Boost</u>, for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds 100%, CRIT DMG increases by 3%. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by up to 150%.
612440.simple_desc: When a character has <u>Critical Boost</u>, their excess CRIT Rate turns into CRIT DMG.
612440.desc_battle: If a character has higher than 100% CRIT Rate and currently has <u>Critical Boost</u>, for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds 100%, CRIT DMG increases by 3%. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by up to 150%.

612441.name: Archery Duel
612441.desc: When a character's turn begins, every stack of <u>Critical Boost</u> restores the character's HP equal to 5% of their Max HP.
612441.simple_desc: When a character's turn begins, their HP is restored based on the number of <u>Critical Boost</u> stacks they have.
612441.desc_battle: When a character's turn begins, every stack of <u>Critical Boost</u> restores the character's HP equal to 5% of their Max HP.

612442.name: Adept's Bow
612442.desc: When any ally uses their Ultimate, they can inherit <u>Critical Boost</u>, and the number of <u>Critical Boost</u> stacks increases by 1.
612442.simple_desc: Ultimates can inherit and increase <u>Critical Boost</u> stacks.
612442.desc_battle: When any ally uses their Ultimate, they can inherit <u>Critical Boost</u>, and the number of <u>Critical Boost</u> stacks increases by 1.

612443.name: Flowing Mist
612443.desc: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases by 40%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).
612443.simple_desc: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases.
612443.desc_battle: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases by 40%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).

612444.name: Auspicious Star
612444.desc: When a character defeats an enemy, regenerates Energy equal to 60% of the character's Max Energy.
612444.simple_desc: After a character defeats an enemy, they regenerate a massive amount of Energy.
612444.desc_battle: When a character defeats an enemy, regenerates Energy equal to 60% of the character's Max Energy.

612445.name: Ejecting the Borisin
612445.desc: After every 6 turn(s) conducted by all allies, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. The effect cannot be triggered repeatedly by the same character.
612445.simple_desc: Every time a certain number of turns had passed, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%.
612445.desc_battle: After every 6 turn(s) conducted by all allies, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. The effect cannot be triggered repeatedly by the same character.

612446.name: Monster-Expelling Rainbow
612446.desc: When a character defeats an enemy, restores their HP equal to 48% of their Max HP.
612446.simple_desc: After a character defeats a target enemy, restore the character's HP.
612446.desc_battle: When a character defeats an enemy, restores their HP equal to 48% of their Max HP.

612450.name: Vermeil Bow and White Arrow
612450.desc: For every Blessing from The Hunt, increases SPD by 3%. This effect can stack up to a max of 6 time(s).
612450.simple_desc: The more Blessings of The Hunt the team has, the higher the characters' SPD becomes.
612450.desc_battle: For every Blessing from The Hunt, increases SPD by 3%. This effect can stack up to a max of 6 time(s).

612453.name: Thundering Chariot
612453.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, delays the enemy's action by 20%.
612453.simple_desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the enemy's action is delayed.
612453.desc_battle: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, delays the enemy's action by 20%.

612454.name: Constellation Surge
612454.desc: Upon entering battle, characters' SPD increases by 30% until they are attacked.
612454.simple_desc: Upon entering battle, characters' SPD is increased until they are attacked.
612454.desc_battle: Upon entering battle, characters' SPD increases by 30% until they are attacked.

612455.name: Catastrophic Constellation
612455.desc: At the end of a character's turn, their next action is Advanced Forward by 8%.
612455.simple_desc: When a character's turn ends, their action is Advanced Forward.
612455.desc_battle: At the end of a character's turn, their next action is Advanced Forward by 8%.

612456.name: Vaulting Ambition
612456.desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, they regenerate 4 Energy.
612456.simple_desc: When a character's turn begins, regenerate their Energy.
612456.desc_battle: At the beginning of a character's turn, they regenerate 4 Energy.

612457.name: Blessed Bow and Arrow
612457.desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, receives an ATK boost equal to 10% of the last-acting ally's ATK. This will last until the next turn starts.
612457.simple_desc: When a character's turn begins after an ally has completed their turn, increase ATK based on the previous ally who had acted.
612457.desc_battle: At the beginning of a character's turn, receives an ATK boost equal to 10% of the last-acting ally's ATK. This will last until the next turn starts.

612530.name: Non-Inverse Antimatter Equation
612530.desc: If a character's current HP is below 50%, they are considered to have 16 extra stacks of <u>Fighting Spirit</u>.
612530.simple_desc: If a character's current HP is below 50%, they are considered to have extra stacks of <u>Fighting Spirit</u>.
612530.desc_battle: If a character's current HP is below 50%, they are considered to have 16 extra stacks of <u>Fighting Spirit</u>.

612531.name: Universal Heat Death Characteristic
612531.desc: When characters are hit or are losing HP, they gain 4 stack(s) of <u>Fighting Spirit</u>. When the turn ends, the character loses 4 stack(s) of <u>Fighting Spirit</u>.
612531.simple_desc: When a character is hit or have their HP lowered, they gain 4 stack(s) of <u>Fighting Spirit</u>.
612531.desc_battle: When characters are hit or are losing HP, they gain 4 stack(s) of <u>Fighting Spirit</u>. When the turn ends, the character loses 4 stack(s) of <u>Fighting Spirit</u>.

612532.name: Regression Inequality of Annihilation
612532.desc: When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is equally distributed among all allies.
612532.desc_battle: When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is equally distributed among all allies.

612540.name: Incremental Doomsday
612540.desc: After being hit, for each stack of <u>Fighting Spirit</u> the character has, the character deals Additional DMG equal to 4% of their ATK to the attacker. This DMG will not be able to defeat the enemy.
612540.simple_desc: After a character is hit, deal Additional DMG to the attacker based on their <u>Fighting Spirit</u> stack.
612540.desc_battle: After being hit, for each stack of <u>Fighting Spirit</u> the character has, the character deals Additional DMG equal to 4% of their ATK to the attacker. This DMG will not be able to defeat the enemy.

612541.name: Catastrophic Resonance
612541.desc: If a character attacks while having <u>Fighting Spirit</u>, consumes HP equal to 10% of current HP and deals Additional DMG equal to 60% of the HP lost.
612541.simple_desc: After a character attacks, consume their own HP to deal Additional DMG based on the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP.
612541.desc_battle: If a character attacks while having <u>Fighting Spirit</u>, consumes HP equal to 10% of current HP and deals Additional DMG equal to 60% of the HP lost.

612542.name: Indicative Depth of Field
612542.desc: For each stack of <u>Fighting Spirit</u>, reduces the DMG taken by the character by 0.8%.
612542.simple_desc: The higher the <u>Fighting Spirit</u> stacks are, the less DMG the character takes.
612542.desc_battle: For each stack of <u>Fighting Spirit</u>, reduces the DMG taken by the character by 0.8%.

612543.name: Devastating Accretion
612543.desc: For every 1% of the difference between a character's Max HP and current HP, their ATK increases by 0.8%.
612543.simple_desc: The lower a character's current HP is, the higher their ATK becomes.
612543.desc_battle: For every 1% of the difference between a character's Max HP and current HP, their ATK increases by 0.8%.

612544.name: Destructive Flare
612544.desc: When a character's HP is lower than 50%, deals 40% increased DMG.
612544.simple_desc: When a character's HP percentage is lower than 50%, they deal increased DMG.
612544.desc_battle: When a character's HP is lower than 50%, deals 40% increased DMG.

612545.name: Disciplinary Flicker
612545.desc: If a character's HP is lower than 35% after being attacked or losing HP, restores their HP by 12% of their Max HP.
612545.simple_desc: When a character is hit or have their HP lowered, their HP is restored if their current HP percentage is lower than 35%.
612545.desc_battle: If a character's HP is lower than 35% after being attacked or losing HP, restores their HP by 12% of their Max HP.

612546.name: Hazardous Lucent Residue
612546.desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 25% of the HP difference between their Max HP and current HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).
612546.simple_desc: After using their Ultimate, characters gain a Shield based on the HP difference between their Max HP and current HP.
612546.desc_battle: After a character uses their Ultimate, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 25% of the HP difference between their Max HP and current HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).

612550.name: Primordial Black Hole
612550.desc: Characters gain a 5% ATK increase for each Destruction Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of 6 time(s).
612550.simple_desc: The more Blessings of Destruction the team has, the higher the characters' ATK becomes.
612550.desc_battle: Characters gain a 5% ATK increase for each Destruction Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of 6 time(s).

612551.name: Reflection
612551.desc: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by 1% of their Max HP. The allied team can only trigger this effect 1 time(s) per battle.
612551.simple_desc: Characters can resist fatal attacks and restore their own HP. This can take effect a limited number of times among all allies.
612551.desc_battle: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by 1% of their Max HP. The allied team can only trigger this effect 1 time(s) per battle.

612553.name: Instability Strip
612553.desc: When characters are hit or have lost HP, 4 Energy is regenerated.
612553.simple_desc: When characters are hit or are losing HP, their Energy is regenerated.
612553.desc_battle: When characters are hit or have lost HP, 4 Energy is regenerated.

612554.name: Metric Reservation
612554.desc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 36% the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).
612554.simple_desc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield based on the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP.
612554.desc_battle: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 36% the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).

612555.name: Sentinel Satellite
612555.desc: When a character's HP is lower than 50%, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 20% of their Max HP for 2 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered 1 time(s) by each character per battle.
612555.simple_desc: When a character's current HP percentage is lower than 50%, they receive a Shield. This buff can only be triggered a limited number of times.
612555.desc_battle: When a character's HP is lower than 50%, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 20% of their Max HP for 2 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered 1 time(s) by each character per battle.

612556.name: Polarization Receptor
612556.desc: For every 1% of HP lost by a character, their DEF increases by 0.4%.
612556.simple_desc: The lower a character's current HP is, the higher their DEF becomes.
612556.desc_battle: For every 1% of HP lost by a character, their DEF increases by 0.4%.

612557.name: Eternally Collapsing Object
612557.desc: For every 1% of HP lost by a character, their Effect RES increases by 0.3%.
612557.simple_desc: The lower a character's current HP is, the higher their Effect RES becomes.
612557.desc_battle: For every 1% of HP lost by a character, their Effect RES increases by 0.3%.

612630.name: Auto-Harmonica: Whitest Night
612630.desc: After a character launches a follow-up attack, they deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to 55% of their ATK for 1 to 3 time(s).
612630.simple_desc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG 1 — 3 time(s).
612630.desc_battle: After a character launches a follow-up attack, they deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to 55% of their ATK for 1 to 3 time(s).

612631.name: Slaughterhouse No. 4: Rest in Peace
612631.desc: When characters launch follow-up attacks to an enemy, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to 80% of their ATK to the enemy being hit. If the enemy also has their Weakness Broken, then deals DMG for 1 extra time(s).
612631.simple_desc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG 1 time. If the enemy currently has their Weakness Broken, then deal this DMG 1 extra time(s).
612631.desc_battle: When characters launch follow-up attacks to an enemy, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to 80% of their ATK to the enemy being hit. If the enemy also has their Weakness Broken, then deals DMG for 1 extra time(s).

612632.name: Champion's Dinner: Cat's Cradle
612632.desc: When characters deal DMG to an enemy with their Ultimate, this attack is considered a follow-up attack. Increases the DMG of follow-up attacks by 15%.
612632.simple_desc: Characters' Ultimates are considered as a follow-up attack. Follow-up attacks deal increased DMG.
612632.desc_battle: When characters deal DMG to an enemy with their Ultimate, this attack is considered a follow-up attack. Increases the DMG of follow-up attacks by 15%.

612640.name: Portrait of A Man On Fire
612640.desc: When causing <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG to an enemy, characters deal additional <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG of different Types for 1 time(s), at DMG values equal to 60% of the original DMG.
612640.simple_desc: Every time enemies receive <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG, they also receive extra <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG 1 time(s).
612640.desc_battle: When causing <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG to an enemy, characters deal additional <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG of different Types for 1 time(s), at DMG values equal to 60% of the original DMG.

612641.name: Just Keep on Crying!
612641.desc: For every 1 Type of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG the enemy received, increases the DMG taken by them by 8% until the end of their next action.
612641.simple_desc: The more DMG Types an enemy receives from <u>Aftertaste</u>, the more DMG they receive.
612641.desc_battle: For every 1 Type of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG the enemy received, increases the DMG taken by them by 8% until the end of their next action.

612642.name: The Hourglass Kindergarten
612642.desc: For every 1 Type of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG the enemy received, reduces their ATK by 4% until the end of their next action.
612642.simple_desc: The more DMG Types an enemy receives from <u>Aftertaste</u>, the more their ATK is reduced.
612642.desc_battle: For every 1 Type of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG the enemy received, reduces their ATK by 4% until the end of their next action.

612643.name: The Painted Albatross
612643.desc: For each enemy hit by a character's follow-up attack, the character deals Additional DMG equal to 24% of their ATK to all enemies hit.
612643.simple_desc: Deals Additional DMG based on the number of enemies hit by follow-up attacks.
612643.desc_battle: For each enemy hit by a character's follow-up attack, the character deals Additional DMG equal to 24% of their ATK to all enemies hit.

612644.name: <unbreak>12</unbreak> Monkeys and Angry Men
612644.desc: When a character deals DMG to an enemy with a follow-up attack, DMG for this follow-up attack increases by 4%.
612644.simple_desc: The DMG dealt by characters within a single follow-up attack increases gradually.
612644.desc_battle: When a character deals DMG to an enemy with a follow-up attack, DMG for this follow-up attack increases by 4%.

612645.name: Aiden Gravitational Rainbow
612645.desc: When a character launches follow-up attacks on enemies, the enemies' action is delayed by 12%.
612645.simple_desc: After a character launches follow-up attacks, the enemy's action is delayed.
612645.desc_battle: When a character launches follow-up attacks on enemies, the enemies' action is delayed by 12%.

612646.name: Twenty-First Military Rule
612646.desc: After a character launches follow-up attacks, there is a 65% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.
612646.simple_desc: After a character launches follow-up attacks, there is a chance of recovering a Skill Point.
612646.desc_battle: After a character launches follow-up attacks, there is a 65% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.

612650.name: Exemplary Conduct
612650.desc: Increases the DMG of follow-up attacks by 9% for each Elation Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of 6 time(s).
612650.simple_desc: The more Blessings of Elation the team has, the higher follow-up attack DMG becomes.
612650.desc_battle: Increases the DMG of follow-up attacks by 9% for each Elation Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of 6 time(s).

612651.name: Mostly Harmful
612651.desc: Increases the Weakness Break efficiency of follow-up attacks by 35%.
612651.simple_desc: Follow-up attacks' Weakness Break efficiency increases.
612651.desc_battle: Increases the Weakness Break efficiency of follow-up attacks by 35%.

612652.name: Suspiria
612652.desc: Increases the DMG of follow-up attacks by 26%.
612652.desc_battle: Increases the DMG of follow-up attacks by 26%.

612653.name: Pale Fire
612653.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of follow-up attacks by 26%.
612653.desc_battle: Increases the CRIT Rate of follow-up attacks by 26%.

612654.name: Back to the Lighthouse
612654.desc: When a character deals DMG to an enemy with a follow-up attack, increases their Energy Regeneration Rate by 24%.
612654.simple_desc: When a character launches a follow-up attack, their Energy Regeneration Rate increases.
612654.desc_battle: When a character deals DMG to an enemy with a follow-up attack, increases their Energy Regeneration Rate by 24%.

612655.name: Doctor of Love
612655.desc: After a character launches a follow-up attack, restores their HP by 10% of their Max HP.
612655.simple_desc: When a character launches a follow-up attack, they restore HP.
612655.desc_battle: After a character launches a follow-up attack, restores their HP by 10% of their Max HP.

612656.name: Platinum Age
612656.desc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, increase their DEF by 40% for 1 turn(s).
612656.simple_desc: When a character launches a follow-up attack, their DEF increases.
612656.desc_battle: After characters launch follow-up attacks, increase their DEF by 40% for 1 turn(s).

612657.name: Clockwork Apple
612657.desc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, increases SPD by 16% for 1 turn(s).
612657.simple_desc: When a character launches a follow-up attack, their SPD increases.
612657.desc_battle: After characters launch follow-up attacks, increases SPD by 16% for 1 turn(s).

612730.name: Spore Discharge
612730.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain 1 <u>Spore(s)</u>.
612730.simple_desc: When a character consumes Skill Points, causes all enemies to receive <u>Spores</u>.
612730.desc_battle: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain 1 <u>Spore(s)</u>.

612731.name: Fungal Pustule
612731.desc: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 <u>Spore</u> to 2 random enemy target(s).
612731.simple_desc: When a character recovers Skill Points, causes a random enemy to receive <u>Spores</u>.
612731.desc_battle: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 <u>Spore</u> to 2 random enemy target(s).

612732.name: Scythe Limbs
612732.desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed. For each Skill Point consumed, the character's CRIT DMG increases by 40%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s), lasting until the character uses an attack.
612732.simple_desc: After a character uses an Ultimate, when a Skill Point is consumed, it is considered as additionally consuming 1 Skill Point. The more Skill Points a character consumes, the higher their CRIT DMG.
612732.desc_battle: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed. For each Skill Point consumed, the character's CRIT DMG increases by 40%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s), lasting until the character uses an attack.

612740.name: Putrefaction Ulcer
612740.desc: Changes the number of times <u>Spores</u> can spread after bursting to 2 times. Can also spread to the original bearer of <u>Spores</u>.
612740.simple_desc: The number of times <u>Spores</u> can spread after bursting increases. Can also spread to the original bearer.
612740.desc_battle: Changes the number of times <u>Spores</u> can spread after bursting to 2 times. Can also spread to the original bearer of <u>Spores</u>.

612741.name: Lytic Enzyme
612741.desc: Increases the DMG caused by <u>Spores</u> bursting. The DMG increased is equal to 35% of the original DMG. After the target enemy was defeated, the <u>Spores</u> they were carrying will spread to targets adjacent to them.
612741.simple_desc: Increases DMG dealt by <u>Spores</u>. After an enemy is defeated, enemies adjacent to it will receive its <u>Spores</u>.
612741.desc_battle: Increases the DMG caused by <u>Spores</u> bursting. The DMG increased is equal to 35% of the original DMG. After the target enemy was defeated, the <u>Spores</u> they were carrying will spread to targets adjacent to them.

612742.name: Metabolic Cavity
612742.desc: For each <u>Spore</u> that bursts, heals the character with the lowest HP by 10% of their Max HP.
612742.simple_desc: After <u>Spores</u> burst, restores the HP of the character with the lowest HP percentage.
612742.desc_battle: For each <u>Spore</u> that bursts, heals the character with the lowest HP by 10% of their Max HP.

612743.name: Excitatory Gland
612743.desc: If the team has 0 Skill Point when an ally uses their Basic ATK, additionally recovers 1 Skill Point.
612743.simple_desc: If the team has 0 Skill Point when an ally uses their Basic ATK, additionally recovers 1 Skill Point.
612743.desc_battle: If the team has 0 Skill Point when an ally uses their Basic ATK, additionally recovers 1 Skill Point.

612744.name: Exposed Brain Matter
612744.desc: The DMG dealt by Basic ATK will deal DMG equal to 30% of the original DMG to a random adjacent target.
612744.simple_desc: Basic ATKs will Blast a single random adjacent enemy.
612744.desc_battle: The DMG dealt by Basic ATK will deal DMG equal to 30% of the original DMG to a random adjacent target.

612745.name: Intersegmental Membrane
612745.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the DMG received by them reduces by 8% for 1 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 2 time(s).
612745.simple_desc: The more Skill Points a character consumes, the lower the DMG they receive.
612745.desc_battle: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the DMG received by them reduces by 8% for 1 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 2 time(s).

612746.name: Catalyst
612746.desc: After a character uses their Skill and if the Skill did not unleash an attack, all allies' DMG dealt increases by 20% for 1 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 3 time(s).
612746.simple_desc: If, after a character uses their Skill, the Skill does not initiate an attack, increases the DMG of all allies.
612746.desc_battle: After a character uses their Skill and if the Skill did not unleash an attack, all allies' DMG dealt increases by 20% for 1 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 3 time(s).

612750.name: Osseus Blade
612750.desc: For each Blessing of Propagation in possession, increases all characters' Basic ATK DMG by 9%. This effect can stacked up to 6 time(s).
612750.simple_desc: The more Blessings of Propagation the team has, the higher Basic ATK DMG becomes.
612750.desc_battle: For each Blessing of Propagation in possession, increases all characters' Basic ATK DMG by 9%. This effect can stacked up to 6 time(s).

612751.name: Spinal Spur
612751.desc: Characters' Basic ATK CRIT Rate increases by 24%.
612751.simple_desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of Characters' Basic ATK.
612751.desc_battle: Characters' Basic ATK CRIT Rate increases by 24%.

612752.name: Channeled Needle
612752.desc: Characters' Basic ATK CRIT DMG increases by 40%.
612752.simple_desc: Increases the CRIT DMG of Characters' Basic ATK
612752.desc_battle: Characters' Basic ATK CRIT DMG increases by 40%.

612753.name: Conjunctiva
612753.desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their DEF increases by 40% for 1 turn(s).
612753.simple_desc: When a character uses a Basic ATK, their DEF increases.
612753.desc_battle: After characters use Basic ATKs, their DEF increases by 40% for 1 turn(s).

612754.name: Scaled Wing
612754.desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their SPD increases by 16% for 1 turn(s).
612754.simple_desc: When a character launches a Basic ATK, their SPD increases.
612754.desc_battle: After characters use Basic ATKs, their SPD increases by 16% for 1 turn(s).

612755.name: Compound Eye
612755.desc: After entering battle, recovers 1 Skill Point after each ally's turn. This effect can be triggered up to 3 time(s) across all allies.
612755.simple_desc: After entering battle, allies will recover Skill Points during the first 3 actions.
612755.desc_battle: After entering battle, recovers 1 Skill Point after each ally's turn. This effect can be triggered up to 3 time(s) across all allies.

612756.name: Sporangium
612756.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character regenerates 3 extra Energy.
612756.simple_desc: Characters regenerate Energy when consuming Skill Points.
612756.desc_battle: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character regenerates 3 extra Energy.

612757.name: Vesicle
612757.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character restores HP equal to 10% of their Max HP.
612757.simple_desc: Characters restore HP when consuming Skill Points
612757.desc_battle: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character restores HP equal to 10% of their Max HP.

612830.name: BCI<unbreak>-34</unbreak> Gray Matter
612830.desc: When entering battle, charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by 65%. Breaking an enemy's Weakness charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by 35%.
612830.simple_desc: When entering battle, charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>. Breaking an enemy's Weakness charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>.

612831.name: SMR-2 Amygdala
612831.desc: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies will charge the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by 50%.
612831.simple_desc: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>.

612832.name: VEP<unbreak>-18</unbreak> Occipital Lobe
612832.desc: The All-Type RES PEN for characters' Ultimate DMG increases by 20%. When an Ultimate is used, for every enemy target that is hit by this Ultimate, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt will additionally increase by 3%. This effect lasts until the next time an Ultimate is used.
612832.simple_desc: Increases the All-Type RES PEN for characters' Ultimate DMG, and the more enemy targets the Ultimate attacks, the greater the increase in the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG, lasting until the next time the Ultimate is used.

612840.name: Attachment: Vestibular System
612840.desc: When characters use Ultimates via <u>Brain in a Vat</u>, their CRIT DMG increases by 80%, lasting until this ability ends.
612840.simple_desc: Ultimate cast with the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> deals more CRIT DMG.

612841.name: Imitation: Transmitter Synthesis
612841.desc: For every 1 Energy that exceeds the characters' Max Energy, charges <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by 0.8%.
612841.simple_desc: When the character's Energy exceeds the limit, the exceeded Energy charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>.

612842.name: Implant: Explicit Memory
612842.desc: After characters use their Ultimate via <u>Brain in a Vat</u>, they gain a Shield equal in strength to 36% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turns.
612842.simple_desc: Gains Shield when using an Ultimate via the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>.

612843.name: Mimesis: Tactile Pathway
612843.desc: After characters use an attack, they deal Additional DMG to the attacked enemy target(s). For every enemy target that was attacked, increase Additional DMG by 15% of the character's ATK.
612843.simple_desc: After characters use an attack, deal additional DMG based on the number of enemies attacked.

612844.name: Analysis: Subliminal Sensation
612844.desc: Characters' Ultimate DMG increases by 50%, lasting until the end of the first Ultimate they use in battle. After entering battle, characters regenerate energy equal to 60% of their respective Max Energy.
612844.simple_desc: The first Ultimate used by a character deals more DMG. Regenerates Energy upon entering battle.

612845.name: Load: Striated Cortex
612845.desc: If characters' <u>AoE ATK</u> ability only attacks 1 enemy, this ATK will deal an additional set amount of DMG equal to 40% of the original DMG to the attacked enemy target.
612845.simple_desc: If characters' <u>AoE</u> ability only attacks one enemy, the ability deals a set amount of extra DMG based on the original ability DMG.

612846.name: Stimulation: Saltatory Conduction
612846.desc: When characters use their Ultimate to attack enemies that are Weakness Broken, delay the enemy's action by 16%. Every time the enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, this effect can be triggered up to 3 times.
612846.simple_desc: Ultimate attacks delay all Weakness Broken enemies' actions.

612850.name: Throne of Engaged Gears
612850.desc: For every Blessing of Erudition currently in possession, characters' Ultimate DMG increases by 7%, stacking up to 6 times.
612850.simple_desc: Ultimate deals more DMG based on the number of Blessings of Erudition.

612851.name: Ring of Bent Wires
612851.desc: Characters' Ultimate CRIT Rate increases by 18%.

612852.name: Scepter of Energy Torque
612852.desc: Characters' Ultimate CRIT DMG increases by 30%.

612853.name: Torch of Anti-Lag Ignition
612853.desc: After characters use their Ultimate, their next attack will deal 50% more DMG.
612853.simple_desc: Increases the DMG of the characters' next attack following their Ultimate.

612854.name: Candle of Delayed Diffraction
612854.desc: After characters use an <u>AoE ATK</u> ability, their ATK increases by 30%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
612854.simple_desc: Characters' ATK increases after using an <u>AoE ATK</u> ability.

612855.name: Canopy of Mottled Metal
612855.desc: After characters use an <u>AoE ATK</u> ability, their DEF increases by 30%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
612855.simple_desc: Characters' DEF increases after using an <u>AoE ATK</u> ability.

612856.name: Garment of Coiled Wires
612856.desc: After characters use their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to 16% of their Max HP.
612856.simple_desc: Characters restore HP after using their Ultimate.

612857.name: Wreath of Interlaced Pipes
612857.desc: When struck with a killing blow, characters will not be knocked down and will instead consume all their Energy, then restore HP equal to 50% of the consumed Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per battle for the whole team.
612857.simple_desc: Characters can resist fatal DMG and can consume Energy to restore their own HP. This can take effect a limited number of times among all allies.

620001.name: Divine Construct: Metastatic Field (Infinite)
620001.desc: After a character is attacked, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG to the attacker, equal to 420% of the character's Shield effect just before the attack. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.
620001.simple_desc: After a character is hit by an attack, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG on the attacking enemy based on the total Shield effect on the character before they were hit.
620001.desc_battle: After a character is attacked, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG to the attacker, equal to 420% of the character's Shield effect just before the attack. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.

620002.name: Ultimate Experience: Sentimentality (Infinite)
620002.desc: After an enemy receives Ice DMG, additionally receive DMG equal to 30% of the original DMG. All other enemies will also receive DMG equal to 30% of the original DMG.
620002.simple_desc: Ice DMG dealt to an enemy can be Blasted to all enemies.
620002.desc_battle: After an enemy receives Ice DMG, additionally receive DMG equal to 30% of the original DMG. All other enemies will also receive DMG equal to 30% of the original DMG.

620003.name: Why Hasn't Everything Already Disappeared? (Infinite)
620003.desc: At the beginning of an enemy's turn, additionally causes DoT for 1 times, and makes their current DoT immediately deal DMG equal to 135% of the original DoT.
620003.simple_desc: At the start of an enemy's turn, all DoT sources on it are triggered 1 extra time(s).
620003.desc_battle: At the beginning of an enemy's turn, additionally causes DoT for 1 times, and makes their current DoT immediately deal DMG equal to 135% of the original DoT.

620004.name: Prosperity, Longevity (Infinite)
620004.desc: Charges <u>Dewdrop</u> when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to 100% of the amount of healing received. And increases the DMG of <u>Dewdrop</u> by 40%.
620004.simple_desc: When a character's HP is restored, <u>Dewdrop</u> is Charged according to the amount of healing received, and DMG done by <u>Dewdrop</u> is increased.
620004.desc_battle: Charges <u>Dewdrop</u> when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to 100% of the amount of healing received. And increases the DMG of <u>Dewdrop</u> by 40%.

620005.name: Imperial Reign (Infinite)
620005.desc: When a character's turn begins, they gain 1 stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u> and increases the stack limit of <u>Critical Boost</u> to 12.
620005.simple_desc: When a character's turn begins, they gain 1 stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u> and raises the stack limit of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
620005.desc_battle: When a character's turn begins, they gain 1 stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u> and increases the stack limit of <u>Critical Boost</u> to 12.

620006.name: Cataclysmic Blazar (Infinite)
620006.desc: For every 1% of HP that characters lose, increases their DMG by 1%. After unleashing an attack, deals Additional DMG equal to 80% of the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP.
620006.simple_desc: The lower the character's current HP, the higher the DMG they deal. They will also deal Additional DMG based on the HP difference between their Max HP and current HP
620006.desc_battle: For every 1% of HP that characters lose, increases their DMG by 1%. After unleashing an attack, deals Additional DMG equal to 80% of the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP.

620007.name: Auto-Harmonica: Whitest Night (Infinite)
620007.desc: After a character launches a follow-up attack, they deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to 60% of their ATK for 1 - 3 time(s). And increases <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG by 35%.
620007.simple_desc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG 1 — 3 time(s) and increase <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG.
620007.desc_battle: After a character launches a follow-up attack, they deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to 60% of their ATK for 1 - 3 time(s). And increases <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG by 35%.

620008.name: Fungal Pustule (Infinite)
620008.desc: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 <u>Spore</u> to 2 random enemy target(s). The max number of <u>Spores</u> that can be possessed increases to 9.
620008.simple_desc: When a character recovers Skill Points, random enemies will receive <u>Spores</u>. The number of <u>Spores</u> they can contain is increased.
620008.desc_battle: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 <u>Spore</u> to 2 random enemy target(s). The max number of <u>Spores</u> that can be possessed increases to 9.
